jd: Hope you are doing good.!!Please let me know if you are interested in the position below Title : Senior Data Management Program ManagerLocation : Remote (with Travel)Duration : 6 month contract; potential for conversion/extensionsVisa Restrictions : No H1b/CPT Job Description**MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE WITH ALATION (Data Intelligence tool) Role Overview: A Sr Data Management Program Manager organizes, plans, and executes data projects while adhering to budgets and schedules. Leading cross-functional teams, defining project objectives, and communicating with stakeholders, they ensure successful project outcomes. Qualifications:8-10+ years of experience in multi project/program management.Experience with data governance, data cleansing, data migrations, data processes.Experience with PowerBI, Power AutomateExperience with Enterprise Data managementAbility to work with CSuite and Stakeholder dailyExperience with Alation is a HUGE plus, data intelligence platform.Certifications such as PMPStrong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills.Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities. Responsibilities:Program Management:Lead and manage data programs, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and objectives.Develop and maintain program roadmaps, milestones, and deliverables.Monitor program progress, identify risks, and implement mitigation strategies.Collaborate with stakeholders to define program scope, requirements, and success criteria.Agile Environment:Work within an agile framework, participating in sprint planning, stand-ups, and retrospectives.Coordinate with development teams, product owners, and other stakeholders.Use Jira to manage tasks, track progress, and facilitate communication.Collaboration:Foster collaboration across teams, including security, engineering, and operations.Communicate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.Facilitate cross-functional workshops and meetings.
